name: Shadowfang Aegis
description: Forged in the black fires beneath Hollowreach, this shield deflects not just blades, but hope itself.

name: Whisperblade of the Pale Queen
description: A blade so thin it hums in silence, said to have slain kings in their sleep.

name: Cowl of Eternal Dread
description: This hood whispers secrets of the grave into the wearer’s ear, heightening arcane senses at the cost of sanity.

name: Heart of the Withered God
description: Still pulsing, this artifact grants forbidden knowledge but draws the gaze of unspeakable horrors.

name: Graveforged Gauntlets
description: Heavy iron gloves etched with runes from the Dead Tongue, worn by gravediggers and warriors alike.

name: Elixir of the Drowned Prophet
description: A viscous fluid whispered into bottles by those who’ve drowned and returned.

name: Vilebranch Talisman
description: Twisted root carved with banshee runes, pulsing with necrotic energy.

name: Ashborne Skullplate
description: Helm of a fallen ash knight, eternally warm to the touch and whispering vengeance.

name: Bloodbane Scythe
description: Reaps both soul and sinew. The blade rusts unless fed monthly.

name: Fleshbound Trophy
description: A shriveled ear strung on sinew—carried by champions who embrace their inner beasts.
